start.description:
GE Healthcare and MIM Software
have come together to create new synergies
start.title:
The
TTV* Challenge
start.subtitle: TEST YOUR TOTAL TUMOR VOLUME SPEED

instructions.title: HOW DOES IT WORK?
instructions.description: The aim of the game is to complete post-processing as fast as possible on the MIM workstation

instructions.title: 1 › WAIT FOR THE SCAN
instructions.description: The Omni Legend scan will begin automatically

instructions.title: 2 › Prepare for the post-processing
instructions.description: After the scan is complete, a countdown will begin allowing you to prepare to do the post-processing on the MIM workstation

title: 3 › PRESS BUTTON TO START THE TIMER
4 › PRESS BUTTON TO STOP THE TIMER
description: Start timer and proceed with post-processing on the MIM workstation
When post-processing is complete, press the button again to lock in your time

instructions.title: 5 › View your results
instructions.description: See how fast the overall process is when using our MIM software
